SEARCH
Package careerhub.storage

Interface ApplicationRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryApplicationRepository
public interface ApplicationRepository
Repository abstraction for managing Application entities.

This interface defines all persistence-level operations related to internship applications, regardless of the underlying storage mechanism (CSV, in-memory, database, etc.). It follows the Repository pattern, enabling high-level services to depend on this abstraction rather than concrete implementations.

  • Method Details

    • create

      String create(String internshipId, String studentId)
      Creates and stores a new Application using a system-generated application ID (e.g., A1, A2, A3).
      Parameters:
      internshipId - ID of the internship being applied for
      studentId - ID of the student submitting the application
      Returns:
      the generated application ID

    • save

      void save(Application app)
      Saves an existing Application object into the repository. This is typically used during CSV loading, where the ID is already known and should not be regenerated.
      Parameters:
      app - the application instance to persist

    • findById

      Optional<Application> findById(String id)
      Retrieves an application by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - application ID
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the application if found, or empty if not found

    • findAll

      Collection<Application> findAll()
      Retrieves all applications currently stored.
      Returns:
      a collection of all Application objects

    • clear

      void clear()
      Clears all stored applications. Typically used during system initialization or data resets.

    • findByStudentId

      List<Application> findByStudentId(String studentId)
      Retrieves all applications submitted by a specific student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - student ID
      Returns:
      list of matching Application objects

    • findByInternshipId

      List<Application> findByInternshipId(String internshipId)
      Retrieves all applications submitted for a specific internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - internship ID
      Returns:
      list of matching Application objects

    • deleteByInternshipId

      void deleteByInternshipId(String internshipId)
      Deletes all applications associated with a specific internship. Used when an internship is removed from the system.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - ID of the internship whose applications should be deleted
